DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate subjective objective performance physiological response AIR OPTIX® COLORS soft contact lens compare AIR OPTIX® AQUA contact lenses participant normal eye prescription need .
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist 7 schedule visit conduct 3-month period . Enrolled participant randomize ( 2:1 ) receive either AIR OPTIX® COLORS lenses eye AIR OPTIX® AQUA lenses eye .
DOC.criteria: Be legal age consent sign Informed Consent document . If legal age consent , legally authorize representative must sign Informed Consent document subject must sign Assent document . Normal eye use ocular medication . Willing wear visitint graycolored spherical contact lenses eye within available power range . Manifest cylinder less equal 0.75 diopter . Best spectacle correct visual acuity great equal 20/25 . Have current prescription glass . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality . Any active anterior segment ocular systemic disease would contraindicate contact lens wear . Use ocular systemic medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator . History refractive surgery irregular cornea . History pathologically dry eye . Corneal vascularization great 1 millimeter penetration . History herpetic keratitis . Eye injury within 12 week immediately prior enrollment trial . Currently enrol clinical trial participation clinical trial within previous 30 day . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
